item.title: _.~`"*~.[Urgent Help! (Reward)!].~*"'~_
item.dc:creator: @J_Bird J Bird
item.description:
@J_Bird wrote:

You need to add some brackets.

{
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073 == true}
{
if(playerLevel[0] <= 99 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) // If you are lvl 98 or lower you cannot wear cape!
remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 1);
sendMessage(“You Need 100 In The Name Of The SkillCape To Wear This Cape!”
}

^^Thats what it should look like, I’m pretty sure.
